title: Welcome to ESI PF Consultant
body: SGC, as one of the leading ESI Consultant, PF Consultant and Payroll Processing Company in Delhi and NCR (Gurgaon, Noida, Ghaziabad, Faridabad), discovered the easiest way of dealing with the problems of maintenance of statutory records under various labour statutes i.e. Employees Provident Fund & Miscellaneous Provisions Acts, 1952 (EPF Act), Employees State Insurance Act (ESI Act), Factories Act, 1948, Payment of Wages under Minimum Wages Act, Bonus Act and Delhi Labour Welfare Fund Rules 1997 and various other acts.

SGC Management Services is well renowned as ESI PF Consultant in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida and all over India. We have adequate proficiency in providing consultancy services under ESI Act, EPF Act, payroll outsourcing, Income Tax (TDS), salary processing in and around Delhi and maintenance of statutory records including applications; follow-up measures and eventual maintenance with all its attending problems.
